name: QStart Labs
tag_list: startups, web-based-platforms, online-marketplace, ad-revenue-platform, web-design, web-development, java, communities, directory-platforms, expert-systems, columbus-oh
overview:
QStart Labs is a web development company that helps start-ups and their investors reduce the typical cash outlay, time-to-market, and risk associated with launching a new web based venture.

Originally formed as the tech team for NCT Ventures in Columbus, Ohio, Weâ€™ve spent years helping NCTâ€™s portfolio companies save on technology costs and utilize more of their investment for momentum building activities that drive better, faster exits!

Our Model: Alignment = Successful Outcomes!

When was the last time your technology partner tied their success to your your success? Rather than continue to let entrepreneurs and investors waste millions of dollars on failed technology efforts, we focused on being a partner, sharing in your risk, and success.

We focused on what a relationship would look like if there was a team that could remove barriers for start-ups, advise them in key business areas such as strategic planning, sales and marketing, HR and Finance, and IT, and create alignment with their objectives and exit strategies. We then built a unique business model around that which means: We only succeed when your company succeeds!

Experienced Web Development and Start-up Advisory Team:

Our team has decades of software development experience in key areas of project management, systems administration, database, middle-tier architecture, and design. We have entrepreneurs, nerds, a suit, a designer, and a project manager. The key to being successful with our clients is a combination of our proven process, our ability to be pragmatic, and a track record of doing the impossible, on-time and on-budget!
